  A collection of submitted material for the 2024 MR Data Challenge. 

The 2024 MR Data Challenge was a session at the 2024 Mendelian Randomization Conference, held at the University of Bristol.

The data for the MR Data Challenge can be found [here](https://github.com/CYShapland/MRChallenge2024).
